# Interactive Part

Click the buttons to see how the box office of top 10 best movies (all-time) change over decades:

<iframe src="InteractivePart.html" width="800" height="800"></iframe>

We can see a clear trend of `genre` that received the highest box offices from 1930 to present (2021), from Drama to Adventure.

Possible reasons can be:

1. Technology has improved the sense of immersion when watching movie, making the `genre` of Adventure more popular;

2. Technology has made adventure and action movies more feasible;

3. People now are looking for excitement more often than in the past;

etc.
